effect.en: If you don't have Klink and Klang on your Bench, this attack does nothing.
effect.fr: Si vous n'avez pas Tic et Clic sur votre Banc, cette attaque ne fait rien.
effect.es: Si no tienes a Klink y Klang en tu Banca, este ataque no hace nada.
effect.it: Se non hai Klink e Klang nella tua panchina, questo attacco non ha effetto.
effect.pt: Se Klink e Klang não estiverem no seu Banco, este ataque não fará nada.
effect.de: Wenn sich Klikk und Kliklak nicht auf deiner Bank befinden, hat diese Attacke keine Auswirkungen.

description.en: From its spikes, it launches powerful blasts of electricity. Its red core contains an enormous amount of energy.
